EmailTemplate.description: Notification when SLA for a Franchise is breached on a Shipment level for Shrink Wrapping
EmailTemplate.name: SLA violation - Shrink Wrapping
EmailTemplate.subject: SLA Violation for shipment - [{!Airway_Shipment__c.Name}] Invoice - [{!Airway_Shipment__c.Invoice_Number_Range__c}] Day -[{!Airway_Shipment__c.Shrink_Wrap_eml_cntr__c}]
